issue.title: [Doc] Document backpressure for the C++ streaming exec plan
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16263](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16263). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is described somewhat in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12228

We should update our user guide for datasets to help users understand how much RAM they should expect to use and what parameters (if any) are available for tuning.
